title: What is the importance of technology in the medical field? - Quora

response.answer_text: Medical technology is like, many other advances we've made in other areas we've supposedly improved. There are negatives aspects, as well as positive aspects that come with technological advances. Almost too late, we've realized that, antibiotics can be overdone to the point where they no longer achieve the results they once had. There's no such thing as a magical cure. All new discoveries, at some point will show themselves to be having negative results, as well as positive results..."C"...
